channel.title: Unix - Where there is a shell, there's a way
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://img856.imageshack.us/i/unix.png/][IMG]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/5581/unix.png[/img][/URL]
I was searching over the net and I thought to myself, "Yeh James, you really need to get off your fat arse and do something." So I came across [i][b]Emulous[/b][/i], knowing it was as scratch as it was yet to realise how hard this is going to be. Anyway, I don't think I'll be releasing the server to play, this will just be a Development for my benefit of putting what I've learnt so far into practise and hopefully getting a good outcome, I don't intend to fully complete this Project but I shall try to get as much as possible done as I can.
Due to various reasons with the update log I won't be putting the date/time things were completed, they'll just been in order.
[b][size=24pt]Update Log[/size][/b] [size=8pt] [ul][li]Downloaded Emulous 1.5[/li] [li]Fixed SWAT's Fullscreen and modified some sprites[/li] [li]Basic Herblore cleaning[/li] [li]Mining sucessfully added[/li] [li]Thieveing sucessfully added[/li] [li]Began re-doing the combat, will finish tommorrow.[/li][/ul]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XdOMkinrGQ4]FullScreen video[/url]
[URL=http://img43.imageshack.us/i/fullscreen123.png/][IMG]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/6506/fullscreen123.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img715.imageshack.us/i/miningv.png/][IMG]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/5785/miningv.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img217.imageshack.us/i/duele.png/][IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/6663/duele.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img854.imageshack.us/i/cvombat.png/][IMG]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/3299/cvombat.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img339.imageshack.us/i/emulous.png/][IMG]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/8057/emulous.png[/img][/URL][/center]

Thanks. Yeh I did but I couldn’t find it.

[center]

I was searching over the net and I thought to myself, “Yeh James, you really need to get off your fat arse and do something.” So I came across Emulous, knowing it was as scratch as it was yet to realise how hard this is going to be.
Anyway, I don’t think I’ll be releasing the server to play, this will just be a Development for my benefit of putting what I’ve learnt so far into practise and hopefully getting a good outcome, I don’t intend to fully complete this Project but I shall try to get as much as possible done as I can.

Due to various reasons with the update log I won’t be putting the date/time things were completed, they’ll just been in order.

[size=8pt]

[li]Fixed SWAT’s Fullscreen and modified some sprites[/li]
[li]Basic Herblore cleaning[/li]
